description: Room @Embedded annotation causing compilation errors or column naming conflicts in entity definitions.
commonCauses: Column name conflicts between embedded objects
Nested @Embedded objects with same column names
Missing prefix for embedded object columns
Type converter needed for embedded field
Primary key in embedded object conflicting
solutions: Rename conflicting columns in embedded class
Use separate tables for complex relationships
prevention: Keep embedded objects simple and flat
Test entity compilation after adding embeddings
examples: data class Address(@ColumnInfo(name = "street") val street: String)
// Results in columns: address_street, address_city, etc.
relatedErrors: Multiple fields have the same columnName
